sentences.en: Allow me to felicitate you upon the birth of your daughter.
Both mother and daughter, who have requested anonymity, are doing fine.
sentences.cn: 这对不愿意透露姓名的母女俩目前情况良好。

sentences.en: French is a daughter of Latin.
He has a son and a daughter living with him.
He has a son and a daughter.
He was trying to woo the daughter of a Missouri aris - tocrat.
sentences.cn: 他正试图追求一位密苏里的豪门小姐.

sentences.en: He would not receive her as his daughter - in - law .
sentences.cn: 他不愿承认她是他的 儿媳.

sentences.en: Radon is the daughter of radium.
She had a daughter last year. They call this one Catherine.
sentences.cn: 去年她生了个女孩, 他们叫她凯瑟琳.

sentences.en: She has the vigour and radiance of someone young enough to be her grand-daughter.
sentences.cn: 她拥有与孙女辈的年轻人一样的活力和容光。

sentences.en: She told them that her daughter-in-law was manic-depressive.
sentences.cn: 她告诉他们，她的儿媳是狂躁抑郁症患者。

sentences.en: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.cn: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.en: The old woman nagged ( at ) her daughter - in - law all day long.
sentences.cn: 那老太婆一天到晚地挑剔 儿媳妇 的不是.

sentences.en: We have two sons and a daughter.
With her were her son and daughter-in-law.
sentences.cn: 和她在一起的是她的儿子和儿媳。
